actions.description:
'Run' - runs the argument actions, such as 'comp'. Available Options:

comp:		Make a new component, such as 'blytz - comp:MyNewComponent'.

actions.name: init
actions.description: Start Vagrant with 'run-db'; Start local servers; initialize pretend data

actions.name: start
actions.description: Start Vagrant with 'run-db'; Start local servers

actions.name: wipeout
actions.description: [currently not working] runs 'dagon stop' then kills Vagrant and local servers

actions.name: vcustom
actions.description: Add and initialize Vagrant custom_commands file
